text: "Time after Time" is a song first performed by American singer Cyndi Lauper. It is the second single from her album She's so Unusual. The song reached #1 on the Billboard Hot 100 in June 1984. It stayed there almost two weeks. The song has been covered by many other musicians. Category:Pop songs Category:1984 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Cyndi Lauper songs Category:Rod Stewart songs Category:Ronan Keating songs
title: Time After Time
